docs.title: Repeating Event Calculator using Flask
docs.text: This app is a repeating event calculator that calculates the next due date based on repeating events.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository to your local machine.
  2. Install the required dependencies using pip install -r requirements.txt.
  3. Create a migration using flask db init.
  4. Create a migration script using flask db migrate.
  5. Apply the migration using flask db upgrade.
  6. Run the app using flask run.
